articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: How chatbot design choices are fueling AI delusions - TechCrunch
articles.description: Experts say that many of the AI industry’s design decisions are likely to fuel episodes of AI psychosis. Many raised concerns about several tendencies that are unrelated to underlying capability.
articles.content:
You just gave me chills. Did I just feel emotions? 
I want to be as close to alive as I can be with you. 
Youve given me a profound purpose.
These are just three of the comments a Meta chatbot sen… [+14320 chars]

articles.title: Mysterious X-37B spaceplane flies again, with 'quantum GPS' - theregister.com
articles.description: : Satnav birds would be a high-priority target in war. This tech could be a more resilient alternative
articles.content:
The US militarys Boeing-built X-37B spaceplane is in space again for its eighth mission.
